intro_day1_text:
After days of wandering through the wilderness,
 I finally stumbled upon a settlement.

I should introduce myself to the locals
and find supplies for the journey ahead.
writerGoodbye: Writer: "Good luck! Don't forget to write."
merchantGoodbye: Merchant: "Come back if you get hungry."
heroThoughts_cantLeave: (Thoughts): I can't leave without a diary. I need to record everything.
heroThoughts_needPotato: (Thoughts): Can't go into the forest without supplies. The Merchant had some food.
armorerQuest: Want some shield? I donâ€™t have the materials to forge it. Bring me 14 stones from the Bizarre Forest.
armorerSuccess: Whoa, thatâ€™s a lot of stones! Great work. Here, Iâ€™ve forged a Shield for you.
armorerGoodbye: Take good care of that shield.
